{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Medium Restore |image = [[File:MediumRestore.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Medium Restore''. |price = 100,000 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] *[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]] *[[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]] }} ==Description== The '''Medium Restore''' is a Mining Energy Restoration Item. When activated it restores 20% of your mining energy bar. ==Details== A Medium Potion to Restore Energy with. It has a 20% restoration rate. ==Acquisition== ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Underground Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Violet City]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Slateport City]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Hearthome City]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Virbank City]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Camphrier Town]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Heahea City]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|100,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]]|20 {{Battlepoints}}}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Rock Tunnel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Altering Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Slowpoke Well|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ilex Forest|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Tin Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Granite Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Wayward Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Castelia Sewers|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Relic Castle|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Pinwheel Forest|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Hau'oli Cemetery|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Verdant Cavern|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Seaward Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ten Carat Hill|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lush Jungle|Legendary}} |} |}
